body_html: I had the same error today (on manjaro linux, however). Somehow there was a system wide tensorflow installation that was updated (python-tensorflow-cuda) which interfered with the pip install of tensorflow-gpu. After I uninstalled python-tensorflow-cuda everything was back to normal. Hope this helps in your case too!

body: I had the same error today (on manjaro linux, however). Somehow there was a system wide tensorflow installation that was updated (`python-tensorflow-cuda`) which interfered with the pip install of `tensorflow-gpu`. After I uninstalled `python-tensorflow-cuda` everything was back to normal. Hope this helps in your case too!
